interactions: m_c is gossiping with r_c1 about r_c2
m_c started a huge argument between r_c1 and r_c2.
After having r_c2 challenge {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, m_c commands r_c1 to help {PRONOUN/m_c/object} punish r_c2. Everyone ends up hurt, though m_c feels {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can trust r_c1 more.

m_c.scar_text: m_c got a scar after r_c2 challenged {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

r_c1.scar_text: Got a scar while punishing r_c2 in the name of m_c.
r_c1.death_text: Died after punishing r_c2 in the name of m_c.

r_c2.scar_text: r_c2 challenged m_c, was punished by r_c1 for this, and got a scar as a reminder of {PRONOUN/r_c2/poss} actions.
r_c2.death_text: {PRONOUN/r_c2/subject/CAP} challenged m_c, {VERB/r_c2/was/were} punished by r_c1, and died as a result.

interactions: m_c and r_c1 discuss where they should be marking the border. r_c2 overhears, and disagrees with their decision, causing m_c and r_c1 to sneer at them in distaste.

To make sure {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} warriors to up to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} standards, m_c forces r_c2 and r_c3 to battle a rival Clan cat. However, r_c2 suddenly grew a heart as {PRONOUN/r_c2/subject} saw r_c1 slicing a cat apart, thus attack {PRONOUN/r_c2/poss} Clanmate to set them free. After m_c throw {PRONOUN/m_c/self} to break apart the fight, {PRONOUN/m_c/subjec} glare at r_c2.

Having enough with the senseless battles, r_c2, with the falsehood of wanting a peaceful meeting with m_c, betrayed {PRONOUN/r_c2/poss} leader with a cowardly ambush! Not realizing r_c1 followed {PRONOUN/r_c2/object}, r_c2 was shock to be under their razor claws and fury yowls! m_c smiles at r_c1 with a bleeding smile.

Listening and agreeing to outside forces, r_c2 came to the conclusion to get rid of m_c and take {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} place. While m_c was slumbering in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest, r_c2 sneaks into the den in the dead of night, then, in the single bound, aim for the yowling cat's throat! r_c1 wasn't far to hear {PRONOUN/r_c1/poss} leader in dire trouble, and quickly settle things down and pen r_c2 between fangs and claws.

With the aid of r_c1, m_c finally captured the loner louging uninvited on their territories. With claws to their throat, m_c would've enjoyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new toy if it wasn't for r_c2 slamming into {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, yowling for the loner to escape! r_c2 will now take their place as the chewing toy...

m_c.scar_text: m_c got a scar after r_c2 ambush them.

r_c2.scar_text: r_c2 ambush m_c, was punished by r_c1 and got a scar as memory of their actions.
r_c2.death_text: They ambush m_c, was punished by r_c1 and in the cause of their actions, r_c2 died.
